text: The Gandhi Smriti (formerly known as Birla House or Birla Bhavan) is a museum dedicated to Mahatma Gandhi. It is considered as the "National memorial of India" respectively. ==References== Category:Museums in India Category:National symbols of India Category:Buildings and structures in New Delhi Category:Monuments and memorials in India Category:1973 establishments in Asia Category:1970s establishments in India
title: Gandhi Smriti
